snippet.title: First 18 minutes of gameplay! EGGLIA: Legend of the Redcap
snippet.description:
See EGGLIA's first quest in action and learn the basics! The first 18 minutes of the game introduces you to Chabo and his new friends in the world of EGGLIA, and showcases the turn-based movement system, the battle system, unlocking new lands from niebel eggs, leveling, items, treasure and more. And while you’re here, get a taste for the game’s gorgeous character designs by Shinichi Kameoka, luscious background illustrations by Koji Tsuda, and magical music by Yoko Shimomura and Yoshitaka Hirota. Get ready to join the adventure and play the rest for yourself!


New JRPG Egglia: Legend of the Redcap is out now on iOS and Android. For more information, visit http://egglia.jp/eng/ or follow Egglia on Twitter at https://twitter.com/EGGLIA_STAFF
